b'Voluntary return always preferable. But when not possible, non-voluntary return is pre-requisite for well-managed migration policy'
b'Five: Return of those not entitled to international protection. To keep doors open for refugees & legal migrants.'

b'Three: Prevent trafficking of migrants by criminal gangs whose only motive is profit.'
b'One: Address root causes of migration.\nTwo: Legal migration to remain open. Mobility a driver of growth in both continents.'

b'Congrats to National Dialogue Quartet for #NobelPrize. After visit to Tunisia in March I understand & respect choice http://t.co/slJbE5dbOg'
b'Libya has too few opportunities for peace. I strongly encourage all parties not to waste the one offered by Bernardino Leon'
b'EU appreciates Bulgaria as pillar of stability in unstable region. Good meeting with @BoykoBorissov in Varna http://t.co/DWn2oEgBA1'
b'Felicita\xc3\xa7\xc3\xb5es ao Primeiro-Ministro @passoscoelho de #Portugal pela sua reelei\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o. http://t.co/GfXLEN7jnC'
b'My congratulations to Prime Minister @passoscoelho of #Portugal on his re-election http://t.co/jJP3U8nHR1'
b'My remarks at the EP today on #EUCO meetings on the #refugeecrisis: http://t.co/zIWA77V0WM. #EPlenary http://t.co/nVM1tuolRU'
b'Quite long queue of political machos to replace mainstream leaders if not able to guarantee security & order for their community'
b'In addition to solidarity, we need responsibility and common sense. Europe without external borders equals Europe without Schengen'
b'Restoration of control of external borders is precondition of effective, humanitarian, safe migratory policy'
b"A potential victory of Assad's regime, more likely today with support of Russia & Iran, will result in next migratory wave"
b'We have to count mainly on ourselves. Our neighbours have bigger problems. Some use refugees for dirty business or political bargaining chip'
b'All have to respect commonly agreed rules (Dublin, quotas). Observing rules will always mean sacrificing part of our interests'
b"Solidarity requires mutual understanding, respect. It is our common obligation to assist refugees & to protect EU's external borders"
b"Everyone's a critic - very few defend Europe's good name. But refugees come because our community is still most open & tolerant of all"
b"Today's #refugeecrisis is a dramatic stress test of our community. That's what the last European Council was about. #EPlenary #EUCO"
b'My remarks following the meeting with Turkish President @RT_Erdogan http://t.co/XysdfTmHug http://t.co/l7H7w89dGu'

b'Good to meet with Turkish president @RT_Erdogan today on the shared challenge of the #refugeecrisis. http://t.co/e0Asw5mmqG'
b'I will address the European Parliament next week, and meet with @RT_Erdogan and @BoykoBorissov. http://t.co/NeznotbHwN #refugeecrisis'
b"Talks with Iraq's PM @HaiderAlAbadi in #UNGA margins http://t.co/bQMlB7gutj"
b"Meeting with Turkey's PM @Ahmet_Davutoglu in margins of #UNGA http://t.co/4cmlCwZbCc"
b'My full #UNGA speech http://t.co/65gCdu0Fzg. Global challenges to be dealt with multilaterally, or they will not be dealt with at all'
b'A global agreement on #ClimateChange must be reached. What matters is practical effects, not ideological fervour. #COP21 #Paris2015 #UNGA'
b'With pledge to reduce CO2 by 40% Europe leads #ClimateChange fight. We invite all to take part in common endeavour #COP21 #Paris2015 #UNGA'
b'Only goal & intention of #Syria peace plan must be to allow people to again start living normal lives in the region. #UNGA'
b'A fact that many refugees flee state terrorism. Stability cannot be won with barrel bombs & chemical weapons against civilians. #Syria #UNGA'
b'On a peace plan for #Syria: we should speak about the interests of millions of Syrians, not just of regional powers. #UNGA'
b'Many countries represented here do not allow migrants & refugees to enter at all. The #refugeecrisis demands global solidarity. #UNGA'
b'Eradicating poverty, supporting #peacekeeping, solving #migration crisis, tackling #ClimateChange: you can still count on us #UNGA'
b'Europe as committed to its values, objectives as ever despite confronting challenges unheard of for decades #UNGA'
b'Speaking right now at #UNGA on behalf of EU. Live on http://t.co/QV0cTWmdkq. #refugeecrisis #Syria #ClimateChange http://t.co/eV2z8iAgYi'
b'EU pledge to UN peacekeeping. 17 EU missions & financing of over 1/3 of UN peacekeeping #UNGA http://t.co/wpc6sjXMRn http://t.co/JMqG9cVfl6'
b"Discussed wider impact of #RefugeeCrisis in Western Balkans with Kosovo PM Mustafa. Support to Kosovo's European path http://t.co/MkBxsYsn58"
b'Discussing UN priorities #RefugeeCrisis #ClimateChange #SDG #Syria with #UNGA president @lykketoft http://t.co/1aEB12ncl2'
b'Told UNSG that Europe leads on #RefugeeCrisis #ClimateChange #Ukraine but more global responsibility needed #UNGA http://t.co/3qvMjLpLPU'
b'Meeting with Iran President @HassanRouhani in margins of #UNGA. With @FedericaMog http://t.co/L2pztOf4xJ'
b'Next week I address 70th #UNGA & will meet with @UN SG, @Ahmet_Davutoglu, @haideralabadi: http://t.co/7UZPoLQ67r. #refugeecrisis #climate'

b"Meeting @David_Cameron this morning to discuss UK's relations with EU in the future http://t.co/tTrAodO9QR"
b"RT @EUCouncilPress: Statement following today's informal meeting of EU Heads of State or Government on #migration: http://t.co/Ai0NCU1dF2. \xe2\x80\xa6"
b'My remarks following the informal meeting of EU leaders on #migration: http://t.co/eGjYOLtSJ0. #EUCO #refugeecrisis http://t.co/rBmRwLf3dL'
b'Measures agreed today are step in right direction; much work will be done before we meet again at October #EUCO. #refugeecrisis'
b'Proper management & control of our external borders is our common responsibility; unfair to put all the burden on Italy or Greece. #EUCO'
b'Thanks to leaders for mobilizing additional 1bn \xe2\x82\xac to help @refugees in the region through @WFP and #UNHCR. #refugeecrisis #EUCO'
b"Addressing the press after today's meeting of EU leaders on #migration. http://t.co/fhfmF3cWad #refugeecrisis #EUCO http://t.co/5KIi1xrTdt"
b"My remarks ahead of today's informal meeting of EU Heads of State or Government on #migration: http://t.co/n1L38lUZo7 http://t.co/YEXSgHoLT2"
b'RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Informal #EUCO President #Tusk @eucopresident on #refugees We must end this cycle of mutual  misunderstandings http://\xe2\x80\xa6'
b'We need to strengthen our external border control including through @FrontexEU, #EASO and @EuropolEU. #refugeecrisis #migrationEU #EUCO'
b'Lebanon, Jordan, Turkey & other countries in the region need more help, as do the EU frontline countries. #refugeecrisis #migrationEU #EUCO'
b'I will also propose short-term measures. We should offer more help to @refugees in the region through @WFP & #UNHCR. #refugeecrisis #EUCO'
b"Most urgent question today is how we can manage our borders effectively; can't speak of a common European migration policy otherwise. #EUCO"
b'We are talking about millions of potential refugees trying to reach Europe, not thousands. #EUCO #refugeecrisis #migrationEU'
b'Conflicts in Syria & Iraq will not end soon. 8 mln people are displaced within Syria; 4 mln have fled to Turkey, Lebanon, Jordan, Iraq #EUCO'
b'Discussions among member states at critical point; we must end cycle of mutual recriminations & misunderstandings. #EUCO #migrationEU'
b'I will be meeting @David_Cameron on Thursday morning. http://t.co/6pxwBc4THP'
b'My congratulation letter to @atsipras following the elections in Greece yesterday: http://t.co/DsGSG4ZALX. #GreekElections'
b"Visit to Za'atari refugee camp in Jordan. We must help Syrian refugees to a better life closer to their homes http://t.co/jyBiBDglgo"
b"I commend Jordan's generosity in helping Syrian refugees. Good talks w/ King Abdullah today http://t.co/eUSAfhFWZj http://t.co/Bb2PDFhyXa"
b'Good talks with President Al-Sisi today in Cairo incl. on #refugeecrisis. My press remarks http://t.co/bBaqAMeTQA http://t.co/tY5pGiv3GL'
b'I appeal to all to donate funds to #WFP as a matter of urgency. WFP had to cut food vouchers to refugees'
b"Our 'migration policy' the sum of despair of victims fleeing war & cynicism of smugglers & too often of tragic fate of refugees"
b'Extra #EUCO to discuss our overall approach to refugee crisis and cooperation with 3rd countries & return and readmission'
b'Protecting the European community our first duty & we have failed. Need to honestly discuss how we can help each other to manage crisis'
b'Refugee crisis a test of our humanity & responsibility. Blame game must stop. Need to rebuild unity & solidarity http://t.co/kUVfEtFWGq'
b'This weekend I go to Egypt & Jordan incl. a refugee camp. Will report findings incl. from trip to Turkey to extra #EUCO next week'
b'I convene an extra #EUCO on Wednesday 23 September at 18h to discuss how to deal with the refugee crisis'
b"Good talks with PM @LarsLoekke on #migration & more. I welcome Denmark's readiness to accept more refugees http://t.co/yHw06ieu2z"
b'During my consultations some leaders requested an extra #EUCO on migration. I will continue consultations & announce my decision Thursday'
b'My press remarks with @GH_Park after the EU-South Korea Summit in Seoul today http://t.co/kM7uRCaCZN http://t.co/PmfvBsJrqi'
b'After contacts with Member States last days, more hopeful today that we are closer to solution based on consensus & genuine solidarity'
b'Without concrete sign of solidarity and unity from JHA ministers Monday, I will call extra #EUCO in September on refugee crisis'
b'I welcome promising Cyprus settlement talks. EU ready to do whatever it takes not to miss this real chance http://t.co/Nyf9U8sfVw'
b'In Cyprus to discuss reunification of the island and #migration http://t.co/rh3AB7o9m4'
b'Working closely w/ @JunckerEU, national & international leaders to find solutions. Need to strike balance solidarity/containment. Not easy'
b'Exodus to Europe is not the solution to refugee crisis or underlying problems. But Europe needs to step up short & long term actions'
b'Refugees in Nizip refugee camp & elsewhere are victims of war, failed states, poverty. We need to help them http://t.co/QixlHao2ax'
b'My remarks after the meeting with PM @Ahmet_Davutoglu in Ankara http://t.co/Ox5cItQ81F'
b'Good meeting in Ankara with PM @Ahmet_Davutoglu on shared migration challenge http://t.co/HeDgXVBuga'

b'\xd7\x9e\xd7\x91\xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9b\xd7\x93\xd7\x99 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x93\xd7\x95\xd7\x9f \xd7\x91\xd7\x90\xd7\xaa\xd7\x92\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9b\xd7\x92\xd7\x95\xd7\x9f \xd7\xaa\xd7\x94\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9a \xd7\x94\xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d, \xd7\x93\xd7\xa2"\xd7\xa9, \xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9f, #MIGRATION'
b"In Israel to discuss regional challenges incl. MEPP, Da'esh, Iran & #migration"
b'My remarks at @Bruegel_org\xe2\x80\x99s annual dinner: http://t.co/6qvkdMoP0f. #Bruegel10 #migrationEU #EMU'
b"Today's issues of #migration, #Greece crisis, #Ukraine war, terrorism & potential #Brexit require us to be loyal to one another & united."
b'We need to reconcile border protection with solidarity towards refugees to the degree possible. Pragmatism is key. #Bruegel10 #migrationEU'
b'On #migration: cooperation with 3rd countries is crucial. This is why I will visit Turkey later this week. http://t.co/mSg0abmVeN #Bruegel10'
b'Legal advice is clear: we can introduce a common European deposit insurance scheme within the current EU treaties. #Bruegel10 #EMU'
b'Three key elements to improve the #EMU: European insurance scheme, capital markets union, euro area system of competitiveness authorities.'
b'Values are more important than ideologies. Need to focus on strengthening the EU in its current framework, step by step. #Bruegel10'
b'When Bruegel started in 2005, the EU was in a deep political crisis. Too much political day-dreaming, too far away from real life #Bruegel10'
b"I'm proud of Europe; happy I was born here. The EU is not the best of all possible worlds, but it is best of the existing ones. #Bruegel10"
b"Tonight I speak at @Bruegel_org's annual dinner on importance of pragmatism & moderation in EU politics. http://t.co/O4gApQPi72 #Bruegel10"
b'My agenda for this week incl. visits to Israel, Ramallah, Turkey and Cyprus: http://t.co/mSg0abmVeN. #Bruegel10'
b'My press remarks on #migration before meeting PM Orb\xc3\xa1n today: http://t.co/AoGiwX2wzc. #migrationEU http://t.co/IrCKE3UV37'
b'Need to help build reception centres closer to conflict areas & increase assistance to 3rd countries like Turkey, Jordan, Lebanon, Morocco.'
b'Need to contain wave of #migration by strengthening borders & getting keys to our Europe back from the hands of smugglers & murderers.'
b'Fair distribution of at least 100.000 #refugees needed. Important gesture of real solidarity. #migrationEU'
b'Unforgivable if Europe split in two on #migration. Approaches of solidarity & containment not mutually exclusive. #migrationEU'
b'EU countries will not change migratory policies overnight but they need to show more #solidarity incl. countries not directly affected.'
b'Meeting PM Orb\xc3\xa1n to be informed of the #migration crisis in Hungary. #migrationEU http://t.co/MYFX3NTnW3'
b'Text of my speech this morning at the #EUAmbassadorsConference: http://t.co/GhYvvyl6l9. #migrationEU #Ukraine #TTIP #Paris2015 #Climate'
b"#Paris2015 negotiations advance frustratingly slowly but clear that there's political will to reach ambitious global #climate agreement"
b'On #Paris2015: EU emissions reduction target is most ambitious contribution presented to date. Other #G20 members need to step up also'
b'Speedy agreement of #TTIP important part of fight for openness, freedom and rule of law in the world'
b'We should accelerate parts of enlargement process related to immigration & asylum in Balkans; need to revitalise links with Turkey'
b'Key to many #migration challenges lies in relations w/ 3rd countries. Need stronger link between foreign policy, home affairs & development'
b'First goal to ensure people in need of international protection receive it. Second we must gain more control of mass population flows'
b'On #migration, I am working with leaders to build new consensus among governments on EU response'
b"#Ukraine is a test of Europe's fundamental values in its neighbourhood: future lies in rule of law instead of mix of muscle & corruption"
b'My foreign policy objectives: protecting EU values, making EU stronger internationally & strengthening transatlantic ties'

b"We have tasked @eu_commission, @eucouncil & @FedericaMog to step up work based on today's #EUCO. We will come back to this issue in June."

b'We will step up cooperation against smuggling networks, through @Europol_EU and by deploying immigration officers to 3rd countries.'
b"We have asked @FedericaMog to propose actions in order to capture & destroy smuggler's vessels before they can be used. #migrationEU"
b"Saving innocent people's lives was our number one priority today. We cannot resolve this humanitarian emergency, but we will take action."

b'We must all make a greater effort to handle worst consequences and agree on concrete action, today. #migrationEU #EUCO'

b'We need better cooperation with & support to countries of origin & transit in order to discourage people to put their lives at risk. (3/4)'

b"Saving innocent people's lives is 1st priority. This includes rescuing people, but also fighting smugglers & preventing illegal #migration."
